DOC.brief_summary: In this study, the investigators are going to compare the clinical effect and safety of topical application of 1.5% Butenyl ALA cream formula without light source irradiation in the treatment of acne.
DOC.brief_title: Topical PDT Cream Without Irradiation Source in the Acne Treatment
DOC.criteria: mild to moderate acne vulgaris (Leeds revised acne grading system score 27) at baseline. known pregnancy lactation any medical illness that might influence the results of the study a history of oral acne medication or surgical procedure, including laser treatment, within 6 months of study enrollment use of topical acne medication within 4 weeks of study enrollment.
